mapper.select: select * from club_member where club_no = #{clubNo} and club_member_id = #{clubMemberId}
mapper.update: update club_board set club_board_likecount = (select count(*) from club_board_like where club_board_no = #{clubBoardNo}) where club_board_no = #{clubBoardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT cb.club_board_no, cb.club_no, cb.club_board_title, cb.club_board_content, cb.club_board_date, cb.club_board_category, m.member_id,m.member_name, a.attach_no FROM club_board cb JOIN club_member cm ON cm.CLUB_MEMBER_NO = cb.CLUB_MEMBER_NO JOIN MEMBER m ON cm.CLUB_MEMBER_ID = m.MEMBER_Id left outer join member_profile mp on m.member_id = mp.member_id left outer join attach a on mp.attach_no = a.attach_no WHERE cb.CLUB_no=#{clubNo}
select count(*) from club_board_all where club_no = #{clubNo}
